name: Hilltop Hotrods
description:
Meet Undead Ed, Doc Ocular and their friends in this easy to learn, but difficult to master racing game.

6 different characters, with their own cars with different capabilities.

It features 30 built in tracks in 6 different worlds.

If that is not enough for you, it has the ability to create random generated tracks, for your unlimited racing pleasure.

Set the fastest average speed, and climb the leaderboard on gamecenter.
Or send challenges to friends via built in facebook challenge system.

Features:
- Upgradeable vehicles
- 30 tracks in 6 different worlds
- Cool graphics and smooth physics simulation
- Designed to look good on low resolution and high resolution devices (incl. tablets)
- Real turbo sound when you upgrade your engine!
